original: de'i phyir cang mi gsung bar gyur to zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir cang mi gsung bar gyur to zhe na /
translated: and therefore the Buddha remained silent,

original: gal te de lta na ni bdag cag gis ni rang rang gi bstan pa bshad zin zhes smos pa de dag gis bstan pa yang ji ltar rung /
analyzed: gal te de lta na ni bdag cag gis ni rang rang gi bstan pa bshad zin zhes smos pa de dag gis bstan pa yang ji ltar rung /
translated: then how can the teachings of those who say, ‚ÄúWe have explained our own teachings,‚Äù be valid?

original: gal te de dag gis @26b spyi'i ngo bor sgro btags pas bstan to zhe na ni /
analyzed: gal te de dag gis @26b spyi'i ngo bor sgro btags pas bstan to zhe na ni /
translated: If you say that they taught by superimposing a general identity,üîΩthen how can that be logical?

original: 'o na 'phags pa dri ma med par grags pa yang de bzhin du ci'i phyir mi ston te /
analyzed: 'o na 'phags pa dri ma med par grags pa yang de bzhin du ci'i phyir mi ston te /
translated: Well then, why doesn‚Äôt the noble one called Vimalakirti teach in the same way?

original: rgyu gang gis ci yang mi gsung bar 'gyur /üîΩgang gi phyir kho na don dam pa de la ni brjod par bya ba'i bag kyang zhes bya ba tha snyad tsam yang /
analyzed: rgyu gang gis ci yang mi gsung bar 'gyur / gang gi phyir kho na don dam pa de la ni brjod par bya ba'i bag kyang zhes bya ba tha snyad tsam yang /
translated: What is the reason that he does not speak at all?

original: ci yang med gang gi phyir /
analyzed: ci yang med gang gi phyir /
translated: Because in that ultimate reality, there is not even the slightest trace of something to be expressed, not even the mere conventionalüîΩ. Because

original: shes bya dang yod pa dang de kho na dang don dam pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod pa de dag gi gnas kyang de na med pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: shes bya dang yod pa dang de kho na dang don dam pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod pa de dag gi gnas kyang de na med pa nyid yin te /
translated: there is no basis for the expressions ‚Äúobject of knowledge,‚Äù ‚Äúexistence,‚Äù ‚Äúreality,‚Äù ‚Äúultimate,‚Äù and so on.

original: 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because there is no reason for engaging in such expressions.

original: gal te de lta yin na /üîΩde la zhes bya ba'i sgras don dam pa brjod par bya ba yin par byas la /
analyzed: gal te de lta yin na / de la zhes bya ba'i sgras don dam pa brjod par bya ba yin par byas la /
translated: If that is so,üîΩthen how can the phrase ‚Äúin that‚Äù be taken to refer to the ultimate,

original: brjod par bya ba'i bag kyang med do zhes brjod pa ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: brjod par bya ba'i bag kyang med do zhes brjod pa ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: and then say ‚Äúthere is not even the slightest trace of something to be expressed‚Äù?

original: de ni nyes pa med de /
analyzed: de ni nyes pa med de /
translated: There is no fault.

original: rmongs pa'i blo dang ldan pa gzhan dag don dam pa de la brjod par bya ba'i bag yod do zhes brjod do //
analyzed: rmongs pa'i blo dang ldan pa gzhan dag don dam pa de la brjod par bya ba'i bag yod do zhes brjod do //
translated: Other people who are confused think that the ultimate is an object of expression.

original: de skad brjod par mi bya'o //
analyzed: de skad brjod par mi bya'o //
translated: We do not say that.

original: zhes kho bo cag de dgag par byed kyi /üîΩkho bo cag de la zhes bya ba'i sgras sam /
analyzed: zhes kho bo cag de dgag par byed kyi / kho bo cag de la zhes bya ba'i sgras sam /
translated: We refute that.üîΩWe do not say that the ultimate is an object of expression

original: gzhan gyis rjod par byed pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan gyis rjod par byed pa ni ma yin te /
translated: or that it is not an object of expression.

original: pha rol gyi rtog pa rnam par bcad pa tsam 'ba' zhig byed du zad do //
analyzed: pha rol gyi rtog pa rnam par bcad pa tsam 'ba' zhig byed du zad do //
translated: We simply eliminate the misconceptions of others.

original: bag kyang zhes bya ba'i brjod pa'i tshig ni la dor ba brjod pa gtsor byas pa'o //
analyzed: bag kyang zhes bya ba'i brjod pa'i tshig ni la dor ba brjod pa gtsor byas pa'o //
translated: The words ‚Äúalso not‚Äù are stated to emphasize the negation.

original: kho na zhes bya ba ni bsnan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: kho na zhes bya ba ni bsnan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The word ‚Äúonly‚Äù is stated to add to that.

original: de yi phyir na dris kyang don //
analyzed: de yi phyir na dris kyang don //
translated: Therefore, although asked,

original: mi gsung bzhugs pas rgya cher bshad //
analyzed: mi gsung bzhugs pas rgya cher bshad //
translated: he remained silent, and so it is extensively explained.

original: kyang zhes bya ba ni bsnan pa'i don te /
analyzed: kyang zhes bya ba ni bsnan pa'i don te /
translated: The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù has the meaning of addition.

original: dris pa kho na'am bzhugs pa kho na'am rgya cher bshad pa kho na'o //
analyzed: dris pa kho na'am bzhugs pa kho na'am rgya cher bshad pa kho na'o //
translated: He was asked, he remained silent, and it was extensively explained.

original: rgya cher zhes bya ba'i tshig ni spyi'i ngo bos sam bye brag gi ngo bos sam rab tu dbye ba'i ngo bos ni bstan par mi nus pa'o //
analyzed: rgya cher zhes bya ba'i tshig ni spyi'i ngo bos sam bye brag gi ngo bos sam rab tu dbye ba'i ngo bos ni bstan par mi nus pa'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúextensive‚Äù means that it cannot be taught by way of a general nature, a specific nature, or a differentiated nature.

original: gal te don dam pa ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la ma gtogs pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te don dam pa ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la ma gtogs pa ma yin nam /
translated: If the ultimate is not excluded from dependent origination,

original: de lta yin na ni mdo'i tshig dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: de lta yin na ni mdo'i tshig dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: then it would contradict the words of the s≈´tra.

original: de'i phyir chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta ba can du gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: de'i phyir chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta ba can du gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: Therefore, it says, ‚ÄúThe bodhisattva who dwells in the observation of phenomena with regard to phenomena. . . .‚Äù

original: rjes su lta bar byed pa ni rjes su lta ba ste /
analyzed: rjes su lta bar byed pa ni rjes su lta ba ste /
translated: The observation is the observation of phenomena.

original: chos rnams la skye ba med pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa dag gis rjes su lta ba'o //
analyzed: chos rnams la skye ba med pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa dag gis rjes su lta ba'o //
translated: It is the observation of phenomena with regard to the aspects of non-arising and so on.

original: de de la yod pas chos kyi rjes su lta ba can no //
analyzed: de de la yod pas chos kyi rjes su lta ba can no //
translated: Since he has that, he is one who observes phenomena.

original: yang na de'i tshul can no //
analyzed: yang na de'i tshul can no //
translated: Or, he has that method.

original: mdo'i tshig 'di la 'gal ba med de /
analyzed: mdo'i tshig 'di la 'gal ba med de /
translated: There is no contradiction with the words of the s≈´tra.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: chos zhes smos pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: chos zhes smos pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: Because it mentions ‚Äúphenomena.‚Äù

original: don dam par ni chos kyang med //
analyzed: don dam par ni chos kyang med //
translated: ultimately, there is no dharma,

original: chos ma yin pa yang med do //üîΩyang kun rdzob ni rnam pa gnyis su bstan te zhes bya bas ni bye brag tu rtogs @27a * //
analyzed: chos ma yin pa yang med do // yang kun rdzob ni rnam pa gnyis su bstan te zhes bya bas ni bye brag tu rtogs @27a * //
translated: nor is there any adharma.üîΩAgain, the conventional is taught as twofold,

original: par bya ba kho na'i phyir gzhan rnam pa gnyis su bstan to //üîΩdon byed dag nus pa'i phyir /
analyzed: par bya ba kho na'i phyir gzhan rnam pa gnyis su bstan to // don byed dag nus pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to distinguish it, another twofold division is taught.

original: yang dag pas so //
analyzed: yang dag pas so //
translated: The real is so called because it is able to perform a function.

original: mi nus phyir yang dag pa ma yin pas so //
analyzed: mi nus phyir yang dag pa ma yin pas so //
translated: The unreal is so called because it is not able to perform a function.

original: kun rdzob kyi ni dbye ba byas //
analyzed: kun rdzob kyi ni dbye ba byas //
translated: The conventional is divided

original: zhes bya ba ni grangs bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni grangs bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: in accordance with the enumeration.

original: rnam par 'grel pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: rnam par 'grel pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: The explanation is as follows:

original: shes pa'o ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
analyzed: shes pa'o ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
translated: What kind of cognition?

original: gsal ba'i rnam pa snang ba can du 'dra yang zhes bya bar sbyar te /
analyzed: gsal ba'i rnam pa snang ba can du 'dra yang zhes bya bar sbyar te /
translated: It is connected with the appearance of clarity.

original: 'jig rten gyis yang dag pa dang yang dag pa ma yin par rtogs so zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyis yang dag pa dang yang dag pa ma yin par rtogs so zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The world understands it as real or unreal.

original: ci zhig ce na /
analyzed: ci zhig ce na /
translated: What is it?

original: chu la sogs pa dang / smig rgyu la sogs pa dag ste /
analyzed: chu la sogs pa dang / smig rgyu la sogs pa dag ste /
translated: Water, etc. and mirages, etc.

original: go rims bzhin du sbyar ro //
analyzed: go rims bzhin du sbyar ro //
translated: They are connected in order.

original: ji lta bur byas nas she na /
analyzed: ji lta bur byas nas she na /
translated: How is it done?

original: nges par byas nas zhes bya ba smos pa'o //
analyzed: nges par byas nas zhes bya ba smos pa'o //
translated: It is said, ‚Äúhaving ascertained it.‚Äù

original: ci zhig yin par zhe na /
analyzed: ci zhig yin par zhe na /
translated: What is it?

original: don byed pa la slu ba dang mi slu ba yin par zhes bya ba smos pa'o //
analyzed: don byed pa la slu ba dang mi slu ba yin par zhes bya ba smos pa'o //
translated: It is said, ‚Äúdeceptive and non-deceptive with regard to the performance of a function.‚Äù

original: 'dir yang go rims bzhin du sbyar ro //
analyzed: 'dir yang go rims bzhin du sbyar ro //
translated: Here, they are to be connected in the proper order.

original: don byed pa la slu ba dang mi slu ba yin par nges par byas nas zhes bya ba ji lta bu yin snyam pa la /
analyzed: don byed pa la slu ba dang mi slu ba yin par nges par byas nas zhes bya ba ji lta bu yin snyam pa la /
translated: Having ascertained it, deceptive and non-deceptive with regard to the performance of a function, how is it?

original: don ji ltar snang ba de bzhin du zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: don ji ltar snang ba de bzhin du zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: It is said, ‚Äújust as the object appears.‚Äù

original: gal te yang dag pa dang yang dag pa ma yin pa'i bye brag yod na /
analyzed: gal te yang dag pa dang yang dag pa ma yin pa'i bye brag yod na /
translated: If there is a distinction between real and unreal,

original: 'o na ni dngos po dag ngo bo nyid med pa ma yin no snyam pa la /
analyzed: 'o na ni dngos po dag ngo bo nyid med pa ma yin no snyam pa la /
translated: then things are not without intrinsic reality.

original: dngos su na gnyis ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: dngos su na gnyis ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: It is said, ‚ÄúIn reality, the two . . .‚Äù

original: ji ltar ngo bo nyid mtshungs she na /
analyzed: ji ltar ngo bo nyid mtshungs she na /
translated: How are they the same in intrinsic reality?

original: ngo bo nyid med pa nyid du zhes bya ba smos so ;
analyzed: ngo bo nyid med pa nyid du zhes bya ba smos so ;
translated: It is said, ‚Äúin being without intrinsic reality.‚Äù

original: /'o na ji ltar yang dag pa dang yang dag pa ma yin par phye snyam pa la /
analyzed: /'o na ji ltar yang dag pa dang yang dag pa ma yin par phye snyam pa la /
translated: But how are they distinguished as real and unreal?

original: ji ltar snang ba bzhin du ni rnam par gnas so zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: ji ltar snang ba bzhin du ni rnam par gnas so zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: It is said that they exist as they appear.

original: 'jig rten gyis ji ltar rtogs pa de bzhin du rnam par gnas so zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyis ji ltar rtogs pa de bzhin du rnam par gnas so zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This means that they exist as they are understood by the world.

original: don byed pa la slu ba dang mi slu ba'i rgyus rnam par gzhag pa yin na ci de dag bden pa yin nam 'on te ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: don byed pa la slu ba dang mi slu ba'i rgyus rnam par gzhag pa yin na ci de dag bden pa yin nam 'on te ma yin zhe na /
translated: If they are distinguished as deceptive and non-deceptive with regard to the performance of a function, are they real or not?

original: don byed pa la slu ba dang mi slu ba yang ji ltar grags pa kho na bzhin te zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: don byed pa la slu ba dang mi slu ba yang ji ltar grags pa kho na bzhin te zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: It is said that the performance of a function is deceptive or non-deceptive just as it is commonly recognized.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: don byed pa de yang ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: don byed pa de yang ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: It is said that the performance of a function is also unreal because it is essenceless.

original: yang gi sgra gnyis kyis ni yang dag pa dang yang dag pa ma yin pa'i tha dad par ston to //
analyzed: yang gi sgra gnyis kyis ni yang dag pa dang yang dag pa ma yin pa'i tha dad par ston to //
translated: The two words ‚Äúalso‚Äù indicate the difference between the real and the unreal.

original: de ltar na kun rdzob ni rnam pa gsum du bstan te /
analyzed: de ltar na kun rdzob ni rnam pa gsum du bstan te /
translated: Thus, the conventional is taught to be threefold.

original: yang dag pa'i kun rdzob ni rnam pa gcig go //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i kun rdzob ni rnam pa gcig go //
translated: The correct conventional is one kind.

original: yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun rdzob la ni rnam pa gnyis te /üîΩrnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa dang / rnam par mi rtog pa'i bye brag gi phyir ro /
analyzed: yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun rdzob la ni rnam pa gnyis te / rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa dang / rnam par mi rtog pa'i bye brag gi phyir ro /
translated: The incorrect conventional is of two kinds,

original: // / bam po gnyis pa /
analyzed: // / bam po gnyis pa /
translated: because of the difference of being with discursive thought and without discursive thought.

original: gal te @27b khyod kyang brten nas skyes pa don gyi bya ba byed pa dngos po tsam /
analyzed: gal te @27b khyod kyang brten nas skyes pa don gyi bya ba byed pa dngos po tsam /
translated: If you also accept that what is produced in dependence performs the function of an object, and is just a thing,

original: ji ltar snang ba bzhin du 'dod na ni de 'u bu cag la mtshungs pa kho na'o //
analyzed: ji ltar snang ba bzhin du 'dod na ni de 'u bu cag la mtshungs pa kho na'o //
translated: then it is exactly the same for us.

original: kyang zhes bya ba'i sgra ning 'ba' zhig ma yin no //
analyzed: kyang zhes bya ba'i sgra ning 'ba' zhig ma yin no //
translated: The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù means not only for us.

original: rigs min par zhes bya ba ni 'dod ces bya bar bsnyegs so //
analyzed: rigs min par zhes bya ba ni 'dod ces bya bar bsnyegs so //
translated: ‚ÄúIt is not reasonable‚Äù means ‚Äúwe do not accept it.‚Äù

original: brten nas skyes pa don gyi bya ba byed pa dngos po tsam la rigs par 'dod na ni thams cad 'khrugs par 'gyur te rigs par na mi rung ngo zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: brten nas skyes pa don gyi bya ba byed pa dngos po tsam la rigs par 'dod na ni thams cad 'khrugs par 'gyur te rigs par na mi rung ngo zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: If you accept that what is produced in dependence performs the function of an object, and is just a thing, then everything is in disarray, it is not reasonable.

original: kho bo cag nga rgyal ga la byed ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: kho bo cag nga rgyal ga la byed ces bya ba ni /
translated: How could we be proud?

original: ci khyod dang mtshungs sam snyam du sems pa'o //
analyzed: ci khyod dang mtshungs sam snyam du sems pa'o //
translated: One should think, Is it the same for you?

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni brten nas skyes pa don gyi bya ba byed pa dngos po tsam mo //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni brten nas skyes pa don gyi bya ba byed pa dngos po tsam mo //
translated: This refers to the mere thing, the functioning of the object that is produced in dependence.

original: ci'i phyir brngas nas 'thor ba dang 'dra snyam pa la /
analyzed: ci'i phyir brngas nas 'thor ba dang 'dra snyam pa la /
translated: Why is it like scattering after cutting?

original: 'di ltar rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos por rnam par nges pa 'di la khyod kyi thabs med pa kho na yin no zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: 'di ltar rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos por rnam par nges pa 'di la khyod kyi thabs med pa kho na yin no zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: In response, it is said, In this case, it is only for you that there is no method for ascertaining the nature of cause and effect.

original: ci'i phyir thabs med pa kho na yin snyam pa la /
analyzed: ci'i phyir thabs med pa kho na yin snyam pa la /
translated: Why is it only for you that there is no method?

original: 'di ltar / rnam pa med pa'i shes pa ni /
analyzed: 'di ltar / rnam pa med pa'i shes pa ni /
translated: In response, it is said, Because a cognition without aspects

original: yul la 'dzin par mi rigs so zhes bya ba smos te ;üîΩrnam pa med pa'i shes pa ni rig pa 'di sngon po yin gyi /
analyzed: yul la 'dzin par mi rigs so zhes bya ba smos te ; rnam pa med pa'i shes pa ni rig pa 'di sngon po yin gyi /
translated: cannot apprehend an object.

original: 'di ser po ni ma yin no zhes rnam par gzhag par mi 'grub ste /
analyzed: 'di ser po ni ma yin no zhes rnam par gzhag par mi 'grub ste /
translated: A cognition without aspects cannot be established as the basis for positing, This is blue, but this is not yellow,

original: nye ba'i rgyu med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nye ba'i rgyu med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no proximate cause.

original: de'i phyir des yul la 'dzin par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: de'i phyir des yul la 'dzin par ga la 'gyur /
translated: Therefore, how can it apprehend an object?

original: cig shos zhes bya ba ni rnam pa dang bcas pa ste /
analyzed: cig shos zhes bya ba ni rnam pa dang bcas pa ste /
translated: The other refers to that which has aspects.

original: yul la 'dzin par mi rigs so zhes bya bar bsnyegs so //
analyzed: yul la 'dzin par mi rigs so zhes bya bar bsnyegs so //
translated: It is not reasonable that the object is apprehended.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is it not reasonable?

original: rnam pa tshad ma min pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa tshad ma min pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the aspect is not a valid cognition.

original: dngos pos ni rnam pa la ma khyab ste /
analyzed: dngos pos ni rnam pa la ma khyab ste /
translated: The entity does not pervade the aspect,

original: mi rtag pa nyid kyis gzhal bya nyid la ma khyab pa bzhin te /
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid kyis gzhal bya nyid la ma khyab pa bzhin te /
translated: just as impermanence does not pervade the object of comprehension.

original: 'di ltar rmi lam la sogs pa la sngon po la sogs pa med kyang /
analyzed: 'di ltar rmi lam la sogs pa la sngon po la sogs pa med kyang /
translated: Thus, in dreams and so on, although blue and so on do not exist,

original: blo la sngon po la sogs par snang ba yod pa'i phyir ro ;
analyzed: blo la sngon po la sogs par snang ba yod pa'i phyir ro ;
translated: the cognition of blue and so on appears.

original: / de'i phyir rnam pa de rigs pa ji ltar dngos po rtogs par byed par 'gyur /
analyzed: / de'i phyir rnam pa de rigs pa ji ltar dngos po rtogs par byed par 'gyur /
translated: Therefore, how could that aspect be reasonable as that which causes the entity to be cognized?

original: gal te rtogs par byed na ni mi rtag pa nyid kyang gzhal bya nyid kyis rtogs par byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te rtogs par byed na ni mi rtag pa nyid kyang gzhal bya nyid kyis rtogs par byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: If it causes it to be cognized, then impermanence would also cause the object of comprehension to be cognized.

original: mi rigs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rnam pa'o //
analyzed: mi rigs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rnam pa'o //
translated: Because it is not reasonable, the aspect is not a valid cognition.

original: yul la 'dzin par mi rigs so //
analyzed: yul la 'dzin par mi rigs so //
translated: It is not reasonable that the object is apprehended.

original: ci'i phyir mi rigs she na /üîΩ'di ltar / gang phyir sna tshogs ngo bo ru //
analyzed: ci'i phyir mi rigs she na / 'di ltar / gang phyir sna tshogs ngo bo ru //
translated: Why is it not reasonable?üîΩBecause

original: snang ba can gyi dngos gcig la //
analyzed: snang ba can gyi dngos gcig la //
translated: the entity that is the basis of the appearance of the aspectüîΩis not the object of the cognition.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: Here,

original: ngo bo ni shes pa'i bdag nyid la ste /
analyzed: ngo bo ni shes pa'i bdag nyid la ste /
translated: the nature is the nature of consciousness.

original: rnam pa rnams bden ji ltar 'gyur //
analyzed: rnam pa rnams bden ji ltar 'gyur //
translated: How could the aspects be real?

original: ci'i phyir bden par mi 'gyur snyam pa la /
analyzed: ci'i phyir bden par mi 'gyur snyam pa la /
translated: Why wouldn‚Äôt they be real?

original: de yi gcig nyid nyams phyir ro //
analyzed: de yi gcig nyid nyams phyir ro //
translated: Because their oneness would be lost.

original: zhes bya ba smos te de'i phyir ro //üîΩde lta na ni shes pa'i @28a * //üîΩbdag nyid kyi dngos po de gcig pu nyid du mi rung ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos te de'i phyir ro // de lta na ni shes pa'i @28a * // bdag nyid kyi dngos po de gcig pu nyid du mi rung ste /
translated: Therefore,üîΩin that case, it is not tenable that the nature of consciousness

original: rnam pa dag dang tha dad pa ma yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: rnam pa dag dang tha dad pa ma yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: is a single entity, because it is not different from the aspects.

original: rnam pa'i bdag nyid bzhin no //
analyzed: rnam pa'i bdag nyid bzhin no //
translated: It is like the nature of the aspects.

original: yang na rnam pa rnams tha dad par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: yang na rnam pa rnams tha dad par mi 'gyur te /
translated: Or, the aspects would not be different,

original: shes pa'i bdag nyid gcig pa dang tha mi dad pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: shes pa'i bdag nyid gcig pa dang tha mi dad pa'i phyir te /
translated: because they are not different from the single nature of consciousness.

original: shes pa'i rang gi ngo bo bzhin no //
analyzed: shes pa'i rang gi ngo bo bzhin no //
translated: It is like the nature of consciousness itself.

original: de ltar rnam pa med pa'am rnam pa dang bcas pa'i shes pa yul la mi 'dzin na /
analyzed: de ltar rnam pa med pa'am rnam pa dang bcas pa'i shes pa yul la mi 'dzin na /
translated: Thus, if consciousness is without aspects or has aspects and does not apprehend objects,

original: 'bras bu dang rgyu nyid 'di ni mi rung ngo zhes bya ba lhag ma'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu dang rgyu nyid 'di ni mi rung ngo zhes bya ba lhag ma'o //
translated: then it is not tenable that it is a cause and an effect.

original: ci'i phyir snyam pa la /
analyzed: ci'i phyir snyam pa la /
translated: Why is that?

original: mngon sum dang / mi dmigs pa'i sa zhes bya ba smos te /üîΩrnam pa dang bcas pa'am /
analyzed: mngon sum dang / mi dmigs pa'i sa zhes bya ba smos te / rnam pa dang bcas pa'am /
translated: Direct perception and non-apprehension are mentioned.üîΩIt is not reasonable that a direct perception with an image or

original: rnam pa med pa'i mngon sum gyis don yongs su gcod par mi rigs so //
analyzed: rnam pa med pa'i mngon sum gyis don yongs su gcod par mi rigs so //
translated: without an image determines the object.

original: rnam pa gzhan ni med do //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan ni med do //
translated: There is no other kind of image.

original: mi dmigs pa ni bum pa la sogs pas dben pa'i sa gzhi la sogs pa dmigs pas mngon sum nyid do //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa ni bum pa la sogs pas dben pa'i sa gzhi la sogs pa dmigs pas mngon sum nyid do //
translated: Non-apprehension is direct perception itself, since the ground, etc. is apprehended as devoid of a pot, etc.üîΩImagine some other kind of image besides direct perception and non-apprehension!

original: mngon sum dang mi dmigs pa gnyis las gzhan pa'i rnam pa zhig soms shig / gal te rnam pa gzhan zhig yod pa kho na yin no snyam pa la /
analyzed: mngon sum dang mi dmigs pa gnyis las gzhan pa'i rnam pa zhig soms shig / gal te rnam pa gzhan zhig yod pa kho na yin no snyam pa la /
translated: If you think that there is only some other kind of image,üîΩthen it is said:

original: gal te rgyu 'bras nyid blo yi //
analyzed: gal te rgyu 'bras nyid blo yi //
translated: If the cause itself is the cognition,

original: thabs 'ga' zhig ni yod ce na //üîΩde smros / zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: thabs 'ga' zhig ni yod ce na // de smros / zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: then tell us, is there some other method?

original: de zhes bya ba ni thabs te de smros shig pa'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni thabs te de smros shig pa'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúthat‚Äù refers to the method; tell us that.

original: ji ste ser sna'i phyir mi brjod do zhe na /
analyzed: ji ste ser sna'i phyir mi brjod do zhe na /
translated: If you do not speak out of miserliness,üîΩthen it is said:

original: de'i phyir / 'dud pa bdag cag la ser sna bya ba ga la rigs zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: de'i phyir / 'dud pa bdag cag la ser sna bya ba ga la rigs zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: How can it be right for us to be miserly toward you who bow to us?

original: 'dir ni 'dud pa'i phyir ser sna'i rgyu med pas ser sna yang med par ston to //
analyzed: 'dir ni 'dud pa'i phyir ser sna'i rgyu med pas ser sna yang med par ston to //
translated: Here, since there is no cause for stinginess, it is shown that there is no stinginess.

original: gal zhes bya ba ni spong ba brjod pa'o //
analyzed: gal zhes bya ba ni spong ba brjod pa'o //
translated: The word if expresses a rejection.üîΩ What is the meaning of the phrase analyze it in another way?

original: rnam pa gzhan dpyod cig ces bya ba de ci'i tha tshig / yang ni rnam pa gzhan ni yod pa nyid de /
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan dpyod cig ces bya ba de ci'i tha tshig / yang ni rnam pa gzhan ni yod pa nyid de /
translated: There is another way:

original: 'di ltar skad cig snga ma 'byung ba la yongs su gcod pa'i shes pa gang yin pa yang rang rig pa las 'gyur la /
analyzed: 'di ltar skad cig snga ma 'byung ba la yongs su gcod pa'i shes pa gang yin pa yang rang rig pa las 'gyur la /
translated: The cognition that determines the occurrence of the previous moment is from reflexive awareness.

original: skad cig phyi ma 'byung ba yang rang rig pa las gcod de /üîΩde'i phyir 'di ni 'di'i mjug thogs yin par rtogs pas 'di ni rgyu'o //
analyzed: skad cig phyi ma 'byung ba yang rang rig pa las gcod de / de'i phyir 'di ni 'di'i mjug thogs yin par rtogs pas 'di ni rgyu'o //
translated: The determination of the occurrence of the subsequent moment is also from reflexive awareness.

original: 'di ni 'bras bu'o zhes bya bar rtogs so //
analyzed: 'di ni 'bras bu'o zhes bya bar rtogs so //
translated: Therefore, since it is understood that this is its antecedent, it is understood that this is the cause and that is the effect.

original: de lta ma yin na ni mjug thogs nges par mi rung ngo //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na ni mjug thogs nges par mi rung ngo //
translated: Otherwise, the determination of the antecedent would not be possible.

original: ji ste rung na ni ha cang thal ba'i skyon du 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: ji ste rung na ni ha cang thal ba'i skyon du 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If it were possible, there would be the fault of an absurd consequence.

original: de ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: de ni mi rigs te /
translated: That is not reasonable.

original: 'di ltar rang rig pa ni yongs su gcod par rig pa'i cha tsam la yang ma rig go zhes bstan zin to //
analyzed: 'di ltar rang rig pa ni yongs su gcod par rig pa'i cha tsam la yang ma rig go zhes bstan zin to //
translated: Thus, it has been demonstrated that self-awareness is not even a mere aspect of awareness that is fully comprehending.

original: 'di ni 'di'i mjug thogs so zhes bya ba'i rig pa yang mi 'grub ste /
analyzed: 'di ni 'di'i mjug thogs so zhes bya ba'i rig pa yang mi 'grub ste /
translated: Moreover, the awareness ‚Äúthis arises subsequent to that‚Äù is not established.

original: de'i yul ni brtags pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i yul ni brtags pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because its object is not imagined.

original: shes pa gzhan gyis 'grub par @28b rtog na yang mi rigs te /
analyzed: shes pa gzhan gyis 'grub par @28b rtog na yang mi rigs te /
translated: If you imagine that it is established by another cognition, that is not reasonable.

original: rnam pa med pa dang rnam pa dang bcas pas yongs su gcod par mi rig pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa med pa dang rnam pa dang bcas pas yongs su gcod par mi rig pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not cognized that it is fully comprehended by that which is without aspects or by that which has aspects.

original: yongs su gcod par rig na ni shes pa'i don yul gzhan du 'gyur te /
analyzed: yongs su gcod par rig na ni shes pa'i don yul gzhan du 'gyur te /
translated: If it is cognized that it is fully comprehended, then the object of cognition would be another object.

original: de ni khyed mi 'dod do //
analyzed: de ni khyed mi 'dod do //
translated: But you do not assert that.

original: shes pa de gnyis kho nas mjug thogs su 'byung ba nges par yongs su gcod pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: shes pa de gnyis kho nas mjug thogs su 'byung ba nges par yongs su gcod pa yang ma yin te /
translated: It is also not the case that the subsequent cognition is ascertained by those two cognitions alone,

original: de gnyis ka yang 'gags pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de gnyis ka yang 'gags pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because both of them have ceased.

original: 'di ni de'i 'og tu 'byung ngo zhes yongs su gcod pa med par rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid du rigs par ga la 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di ni de'i 'og tu 'byung ngo zhes yongs su gcod pa med par rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid du rigs par ga la 'gyur te /
translated: How could it be reasonable that there is a cause and effect without ascertaining ‚Äúthis arises subsequent to that‚Äù?

original: ha cang yang thal ba'i phyir mi rung ngo //
analyzed: ha cang yang thal ba'i phyir mi rung ngo //
translated: because that would be too extreme.

original: de lta na ni gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud la yod pa'i las 'di'i 'bras bu 'di yin no zhes bya bar rig pa med pas thams cad mkhyen pa dag gis kyang rtogs par mi spyod de /
analyzed: de lta na ni gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud la yod pa'i las 'di'i 'bras bu 'di yin no zhes bya bar rig pa med pas thams cad mkhyen pa dag gis kyang rtogs par mi spyod de /
translated: If that were so, since there would be no awareness of the form, ‚ÄúThis is the result of this action existing in the continuum of another‚Äôs mind,‚Äù even omniscient ones would not know it.

original: rig pa'i yul ni rang gi ngo bo tsam yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rig pa'i yul ni rang gi ngo bo tsam yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the object of awareness is merely the nature of the object.

original: gang gis 'di lta bur rtogs pa'i rnam pa gzhan ni med do //
analyzed: gang gis 'di lta bur rtogs pa'i rnam pa gzhan ni med do //
translated: There is no other aspect by which it is known.

original: des na thams cad mkhyen des kyang zhes bya ba'i kyang gi sgra ni gzhan nyi tshe ma yin no //
analyzed: des na thams cad mkhyen des kyang zhes bya ba'i kyang gi sgra ni gzhan nyi tshe ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the word ‚Äúalso‚Äù in the phrase ‚Äúeven omniscient ones‚Äù means that it is not only others.

original: des na rnam pa med pa'i shes pa ni //
analyzed: des na rnam pa med pa'i shes pa ni //
translated: Thus, consciousness without aspects

original: yul la 'dzin par mi rigs so //
analyzed: yul la 'dzin par mi rigs so //
translated: cannot apprehend objects.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rnam pas rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid cung zad tsam yang nges par rtogs par mi nus so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rnam pas rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid cung zad tsam yang nges par rtogs par mi nus so //
translated: In this and other ways, it is impossible to ascertain even the slightest cause and effect.

original: yang gi sgra ni mtha' dag kyang ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: yang gi sgra ni mtha' dag kyang ma yin pa'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù means not only some.

original: gang dag gi zhe na /
analyzed: gang dag gi zhe na /
translated: Whose?

original: gzhan gyi dbang gi skad cig gi'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi dbang gi skad cig gi'o //
translated: The moments of the dependent nature.

original: sangs rgyas spyod yul bsam yas pas //
analyzed: sangs rgyas spyod yul bsam yas pas //
translated: Because the domain of the Buddha is inconceivable,

original: thams cad mkhyen pa kho nas mkhyen //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa kho nas mkhyen //
translated: only the Omniscient One knows it.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni gsal bas ma bshad do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni gsal bas ma bshad do //
translated: The meaning of this and other such passages is clear.

original: 'di dag tsam gyis rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos por khas blangs pa'i thabs med par bstan to //
analyzed: 'di dag tsam gyis rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos por khas blangs pa'i thabs med par bstan to //
translated: This much is taught to show that there is no way to accept the existence of cause and effect.

original: da ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po nyid kyang med par bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po nyid kyang med par bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to show that even the existence of cause and effect is untenable,

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po yang rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po yang rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: it is said: The existence of cause and effect is also not tenable.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar / du mas dngos po gcig mi byed //
analyzed: 'di ltar / du mas dngos po gcig mi byed //
translated: Because: Many do not produce one thing.

original: du mas du ma byed ma yin //üîΩgcig gis du ma'i dngos mi byed //
analyzed: du mas du ma byed ma yin // gcig gis du ma'i dngos mi byed //
translated: Many do not produce many.üîΩOne does not produce many things.

original: gcig gis gcig byed pa yang min //üîΩzhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: gcig gis gcig byed pa yang min // zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: One does not produce one.

original: tshigs su bcad pa 'di la ni //
analyzed: tshigs su bcad pa 'di la ni //
translated: In this verse,

original: rnam par rtog pa bzhi yod de //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa bzhi yod de //
translated: there are four alternatives.

original: de la dang po'i dbang du byas nas /
analyzed: de la dang po'i dbang du byas nas /
translated: With respect to the first,

original: du mas gcig byed pa ma yin te zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: du mas gcig byed pa ma yin te zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: it is said: ‚ÄúMany do not produce one thing.‚Äù

original: ci'i phyir du mas gcig mi byed snyam pa la /
analyzed: ci'i phyir du mas gcig mi byed snyam pa la /
translated: Why does a multiplicity not produce a unity?

original: 'di ltar / ngo bo nyid tha dad pa mig la sogs pa dag las zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: 'di ltar / ngo bo nyid tha dad pa mig la sogs pa dag las zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: In response to this question, he says, ‚Äúfrom the different natures of the eye, etc.‚Äù

original: sogs pa smos pas ni gzugs dang snang ba dang yid la byed pa @29a * //üîΩla sogs pa dag bsdu'o //
analyzed: sogs pa smos pas ni gzugs dang snang ba dang yid la byed pa @29a * // la sogs pa dag bsdu'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúetc.‚Äù includes form, light, and mental activity.üîΩThe effect is not different.

original: 'bras bu tha dad pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni mig gi rnam par shes pa ste 'byung bar khas blangs pa la /
analyzed: 'bras bu tha dad pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni mig gi rnam par shes pa ste 'byung bar khas blangs pa la /
translated: The eye consciousness is accepted as the effect.üîΩThe cause is different.

original: rgyu tha dad pa ni tha dad pa byed par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyu tha dad pa ni tha dad pa byed par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The different cause does not produce a different effect.

original: ci'i phyir snyam pa la /
analyzed: ci'i phyir snyam pa la /
translated: Why is that?

original: de tha dad kyang zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de tha dad kyang zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: He says, ‚ÄúEven though the cause is different, etc.‚Äù

original: rgyu tha dad kyang ngo //
analyzed: rgyu tha dad kyang ngo //
translated: The cause is different.

original: tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu'o //
translated: Because the effect is not different.

original: de lta na /üîΩtha dad pa ma yin pa med kyang zhes bya ba ni rgyu la bya'o //üîΩtha dad pa med par gyur pas //
analyzed: de lta na / tha dad pa ma yin pa med kyang zhes bya ba ni rgyu la bya'o // tha dad pa med par gyur pas //
translated: In that case,üîΩeven though the effect is not different, etc.üîΩThe cause is different.

original: zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu'o //
translated: Because the effect is not different.

original: de lta bas na tha dad pa med pa ni rgyu'o //
analyzed: de lta bas na tha dad pa med pa ni rgyu'o //
translated: Thus, the cause is not different.

original: tha dad pa med pa byed par mi 'gyur ba ni 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: tha dad pa med pa byed par mi 'gyur ba ni 'bras bu'o //
translated: The effect is the non-differentiation of the cause.

original: rgyu'i tha dad pa dang tha dad pa med pa'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa la ltos pa 'bras bu'i tha dad pa dang / tha dad pa med pa dag ni rgyu dang bcas par 'gyur na /
analyzed: rgyu'i tha dad pa dang tha dad pa med pa'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa la ltos pa 'bras bu'i tha dad pa dang / tha dad pa med pa dag ni rgyu dang bcas par 'gyur na /
translated: If the differentiation and non-differentiation of the effect were dependent on the differentiation and non-differentiation of the cause, then the differentiation and non-differentiation of the effect would have a cause.

original: 'dir ni de lta ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dir ni de lta ma yin te /
translated: But that is not the case here.

original: de'i phyir 'bras bu'i tha dad pa dang tha dad pa med pa dag ni rgyu med pa can du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'bras bu'i tha dad pa dang tha dad pa med pa dag ni rgyu med pa can du 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the differentiation and non-differentiation of the effect would be without a cause.

original: gal te khyod kyis tha dad pa dang tha dad pa med pa dag rgyu med pa can yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te khyod kyis tha dad pa dang tha dad pa med pa dag rgyu med pa can yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the differentiation and non-differentiation are without a cause,üîΩthen everything would be without a cause,

original: de las gud na med pa'i phyir //üîΩzhes bya ba smos te /üîΩthams cad ni tha dad pa dang tha dad pa ma yin pa las gud na med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de las gud na med pa'i phyir // zhes bya ba smos te / thams cad ni tha dad pa dang tha dad pa ma yin pa las gud na med pa'i phyir /
translated: because there is nothing apart from them.

original: thams cad kun rgyu med pa can du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thams cad kun rgyu med pa can du 'gyur ro //
translated: Everything is without a cause, because there is nothing apart from the differentiation and non-differentiation.

original: de ltar rgyu med pa can du gyur na rtag tu yod pa'am med pa zhig tu 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ltar rgyu med pa can du gyur na rtag tu yod pa'am med pa zhig tu 'gyur te /
translated: If everything were without a cause, then it would always exist or be nonexistent.

original: thams cad ces bya ba lhag ma'o //
analyzed: thams cad ces bya ba lhag ma'o //
translated: ‚ÄúEverything‚Äù is the remainder.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: rgyu gzhan la ni mi ltos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu gzhan la ni mi ltos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it does not depend on another cause.

original: ltos na ni dngos po rnams res 'ga' ba nyid yin par srid do //
analyzed: ltos na ni dngos po rnams res 'ga' ba nyid yin par srid do //
translated: If it did depend, then it would be possible that things would be occasional.

original: gal te 'bras bu'i skyed par byed pa ni tshogs pa can yin te /
analyzed: gal te 'bras bu'i skyed par byed pa ni tshogs pa can yin te /
translated: If the cause of the effect is the collection,

original: de'i yang tha dad pa dang tha dad pa ma yin pa'i rjes su byed par gsal zhing de'i rjes su 'gro ba dang / ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa des na /
analyzed: de'i yang tha dad pa dang tha dad pa ma yin pa'i rjes su byed par gsal zhing de'i rjes su 'gro ba dang / ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa des na /
translated: then the effect would be the same as the collection, because it is clear that it would follow the collection in being different or non-different, and it would follow the collection in being present or absent.

original: 'bras bu tha dad pa dang tha dad pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'bras bu tha dad pa dang tha dad pa ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, the effect would be different or non-different.

original: de bas na ji ltar rgyu med pa can du 'gyur ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: de bas na ji ltar rgyu med pa can du 'gyur ba yin zhe na /
translated: So how could it be causeless?

original: de ni rung ba ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni rung ba ma yin te /
translated: That is not correct.

original: 'di ltar tshogs pa can dag las //
analyzed: 'di ltar tshogs pa can dag las //
translated: Because the collection is not different from the collection itself.

original: gud na tshogs pa can zhes bya ba gang yang med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gud na tshogs pa can zhes bya ba gang yang med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: There is nothing at all called a ‚Äúcollection‚Äù apart from the collection itself.

original: de dag kyang phan tshun tha dad pa log pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas tha dad pa kho na yin na /
analyzed: de dag kyang phan tshun tha dad pa log pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas tha dad pa kho na yin na /
translated: And since the collection itself is the nature of the negation of the difference of the individual members, it is only different.

original: 'bras bu tha dad pa ma yin pa gcig pu skyed par ji ltar nus /
analyzed: 'bras bu tha dad pa ma yin pa gcig pu skyed par ji ltar nus /
translated: How can it generate a single effect that is not different from itself?

original: tshogs pa can gzhan gyi nang du gtogs pa'i tshogs pa dag kyang ci'i phyir de skyed par mi byed /
analyzed: tshogs pa can gzhan gyi nang du gtogs pa'i tshogs pa dag kyang ci'i phyir de skyed par mi byed /
translated: Why doesn‚Äôt the collection of the other members of the collection generate it?

original: de las tha dad pa'i phyir skyed par mi byed do zhe na /
analyzed: de las tha dad pa'i phyir skyed par mi byed do zhe na /
translated: If you say, ‚ÄúIt does not generate it because it is different from that,‚Äù

original: de bzhin no //
analyzed: de bzhin no //
translated: then that is so.

original: gang dag @29b de skyed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bye brag dang ldan pa'i lus myong bar byed pa de dag de skyed par byed kyi cig shos ni ma yin no zhe na yang 'khrul pa yin te /üîΩde skyed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bye brag gcig las tha dad pa ma yin pa dang ldan pa'i lus 'dzin pa ni mig la sogs pa 'di dag phan tshun tha dad par /
analyzed: gang dag @29b de skyed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bye brag dang ldan pa'i lus myong bar byed pa de dag de skyed par byed kyi cig shos ni ma yin no zhe na yang 'khrul pa yin te / de skyed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bye brag gcig las tha dad pa ma yin pa dang ldan pa'i lus 'dzin pa ni mig la sogs pa 'di dag phan tshun tha dad par /
translated: If you say, ‚ÄúThose that experience a body that possesses a particular nature that generates it generate it, but the other does not,‚Äù that is also mistaken.

original: mngon sum la sogs pa'i tshad ma dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mngon sum la sogs pa'i tshad ma dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The body that possesses a particular nature that generates it is not different from a single thing. If you apprehend it, then it would contradict direct perception and other valid knowledge that the eye and so on are different from each other.

original: yang na de skyed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyang tha dad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: yang na de skyed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyang tha dad par 'gyur te /
translated: Or, the particular nature that generates it would be different.

original: ngo bo nyid tha dad pa mig la sogs pa tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid tha dad pa mig la sogs pa tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the different eyes, etc. are different in substance.

original: de lta na ni ngo bo nyid tha dad pa mig la sogs pa zhes brjod pa'i skyon du 'gyur ba de nyid kyis phyogs de shin tu legs pa ma yin par ston to //
analyzed: de lta na ni ngo bo nyid tha dad pa mig la sogs pa zhes brjod pa'i skyon du 'gyur ba de nyid kyis phyogs de shin tu legs pa ma yin par ston to //
translated: Thus, the fault that is stated, namely, that the different eyes, etc. are different in substance, demonstrates that this position is not good at all.

original: ji ste de dag las de skyed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bye brag tha dad do zhes gzhan zer na /
analyzed: ji ste de dag las de skyed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bye brag tha dad do zhes gzhan zer na /
translated: If someone else says that the difference in substance that produces them is different,

original: de lta na yang nyes pa 'di nyid yin te /
analyzed: de lta na yang nyes pa 'di nyid yin te /
translated: then, in that case, this very fault is incurred.

original: gang gi phyir 'di nyid 'bras bu bsgrub pa'i mthu'i bye brag dang ldan pa myong bar byed do //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'di nyid 'bras bu bsgrub pa'i mthu'i bye brag dang ldan pa myong bar byed do //
translated: Because it is just this that possesses the power to accomplish the effect that is experienced.

original: 'bras bu 'byung bar bya ba'i byed pa bye brag can blangs pa yin gyi /
analyzed: 'bras bu 'byung bar bya ba'i byed pa bye brag can blangs pa yin gyi /
translated: The function of producing the effect is taken to be specific.

original: mig la sogs pa gzhan ni de lta ma yin par 'gyur te /
analyzed: mig la sogs pa gzhan ni de lta ma yin par 'gyur te /
translated: But the other eyes, etc. are not like that.

original: de'i phyir nus par brjod pa mtha' dag dang bral ba'i gnas skabs su 'gyur bas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid las /
analyzed: de'i phyir nus par brjod pa mtha' dag dang bral ba'i gnas skabs su 'gyur bas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid las /
translated: Therefore, since they are devoid of the entire expression of potentiality, they are in a state that is the nature of non-existence.

original: de'i ngo bo gzhan ci zhig yod shin tu smros shig / de'i phyir khyod mngon sum la sogs pa dang 'gal ba dang shin tu ldan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo gzhan ci zhig yod shin tu smros shig / de'i phyir khyod mngon sum la sogs pa dang 'gal ba dang shin tu ldan par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, you are in complete contradiction with perception and so on.

original: phyogs gnyis pa la brten nas lan gdab pa'i phyir /
analyzed: phyogs gnyis pa la brten nas lan gdab pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to respond based on the second position,

original: de ltar ni mi 'gyur te zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de ltar ni mi 'gyur te zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: he says, ‚ÄúThis is not so.‚Äù

original: thams cad rgyu med pa can nyid du 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: thams cad rgyu med pa can nyid du 'gyur ba'o //
translated: Everything would be causeless.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gang gi phyir rgyu du mas du ma byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: gang gi phyir rgyu du mas du ma byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: He says, ‚ÄúBecause many causes produce many effects.‚Äù

original: de nyid ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de nyid ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rgyu'i nye bar sbyor bas 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid kyi bye brag ma 'dres pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: rgyu'i nye bar sbyor bas 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid kyi bye brag ma 'dres pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: He says, ‚ÄúBecause the specific nature of the effect is not mixed due to the application of the cause.‚Äù

original: rgyu rnams kyi nye bar sbyor ba ni byed pa ste /
analyzed: rgyu rnams kyi nye bar sbyor ba ni byed pa ste /
translated: The application of causes is their activity.

original: byed pas 'bras bu bskyed par bya ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi bye brag de ma 'dres pa'i phyir ro zhes tshig rnam par sbyar ro //
analyzed: byed pas 'bras bu bskyed par bya ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi bye brag de ma 'dres pa'i phyir ro zhes tshig rnam par sbyar ro //
translated: The specific nature of the effect to be produced is not mixed due to that activity. The words are to be connected in this way.

original: yang na rgyu'i nye bar sbyor bas 'bras bu de'i ngo bo nyid kyi bye brag de ma 'dres pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang na rgyu'i nye bar sbyor bas 'bras bu de'i ngo bo nyid kyi bye brag de ma 'dres pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Or, because the cause is applied to the particular of the effect, that particular of the effect is not mixed.

original: de nyid ci'i phyir snyam pa la /üîΩde'i bye brag la nye bar sbyor ba'i phyir te zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de nyid ci'i phyir snyam pa la / de'i bye brag la nye bar sbyor ba'i phyir te zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Why is that?üîΩBecause the cause is applied to its particular.

original: 'bras bu de'i bye brag la rgyu rnams nye bar sbyor ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: 'bras bu de'i bye brag la rgyu rnams nye bar sbyor ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning is: because the causes are applied to the particular of the effect.

original: gal te de'i bye brag la rgyu rnams nye bar sbyor ba ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de'i bye brag la rgyu rnams nye bar sbyor ba ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: If the causes are applied to the particular of the effect, how are they applied?üîΩTherefore, it says:

original: de'i phyir rang gi ngo bo nyid ji lta bu @30a * //
analyzed: de'i phyir rang gi ngo bo nyid ji lta bu @30a * //
translated: Just as its own nature.

original: bye brag gis zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: bye brag gis zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The meaning is:

original: rgyu gang gi ngo bo nyid ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba kho na 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid la sbyor zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rgyu gang gi ngo bo nyid ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba kho na 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid la sbyor zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Just as the nature of the cause is, so the nature of the effect is.

original: gal te de nyid ji lta bu zhig ce na /
analyzed: gal te de nyid ji lta bu zhig ce na /
translated: If that is so, how is it?

original: de'i phyir 'di ltar mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen gyi rnam par shes pa las ni mig gi rnam par shes pa rtogs pa'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di ltar mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen gyi rnam par shes pa las ni mig gi rnam par shes pa rtogs pa'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the visual consciousness arises from the immediately preceding condition in the form of a consciousness.

original: mig gi dbang po las ni rtogs pa'i bdag nyid de gzugs la 'dzin nus pa nyid du so sor nges so //
analyzed: mig gi dbang po las ni rtogs pa'i bdag nyid de gzugs la 'dzin nus pa nyid du so sor nges so //
translated: From the eye faculty, it arises in the form of an apprehender, because it is determined to be capable of apprehending form.

original: yul las ni de dang mthun pa'i ngo bo kho nar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yul las ni de dang mthun pa'i ngo bo kho nar 'gyur ro //
translated: From the object, it arises in the form that is consistent with it.

original: dngos su na 'bras bu tha dad pa ma yin yang /
analyzed: dngos su na 'bras bu tha dad pa ma yin yang /
translated: Although the effect is not actually different,

original: rgyu rnams kyi ngo bo nyid tha dad pa dag gis ngo bo nyid tha dad pa kho nar 'gyur te /
analyzed: rgyu rnams kyi ngo bo nyid tha dad pa dag gis ngo bo nyid tha dad pa kho nar 'gyur te /
translated: it becomes different in essence due to the difference in the essences of the causes.

original: rgyu tha dad pas kyang 'bras bu'i bye brag de tha dad pa med pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rgyu tha dad pas kyang 'bras bu'i bye brag de tha dad pa med pa ni ma yin no //
translated: And due to the difference in causes, the difference in the effect is not non-existent.

original: gzhan du yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: gzhan du yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: The same should be applied to other cases as well.

original: 'di bsal ba'i phyir /
analyzed: 'di bsal ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to refute this,üîΩhe says:

original: de ni rigs pa ma yin te //üîΩzhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de ni rigs pa ma yin te // zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: That is not reasonable.

original: rigs pas rung ba ma yin zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rigs pas rung ba ma yin zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This means it is not logically possible.

original: ci'i phyir snyam pa la /
analyzed: ci'i phyir snyam pa la /
translated: Why?

original: rtogs pa'i bdag nyid la sogs pa dag ces bya ba smos te /
analyzed: rtogs pa'i bdag nyid la sogs pa dag ces bya ba smos te /
translated: It is said, ‚Äúbecause of the nature of the cognizer, etc.‚Äù

original: sogs pa smos pas ni gzugs la 'dzin nus pa nyid du nges pa la sogs pa bsdu'o //
analyzed: sogs pa smos pas ni gzugs la 'dzin nus pa nyid du nges pa la sogs pa bsdu'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúetc.‚Äù includes the certainty of the ability to apprehend form, etc.

original: phan tshun tha dad par khas len na ni rnam par shes pa de du mar 'gyur te rtogs pa'i bdag nyid la sogs pa de dag dang tha mi dad pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: phan tshun tha dad par khas len na ni rnam par shes pa de du mar 'gyur te rtogs pa'i bdag nyid la sogs pa de dag dang tha mi dad pa'i phyir te /
translated: If one accepts that they are mutually different, then consciousness would be multiple, because it would not be different from those, the nature of the cognizer, etc.

original: rtogs pa'i bdag nyid la sogs pa'i rang gi bdag nyid bzhin no //
analyzed: rtogs pa'i bdag nyid la sogs pa'i rang gi bdag nyid bzhin no //
translated: It would be like the individual natures of the nature of the cognizer, etc.

original: ji ste na gal te de dag dang tha mi dad pa mi 'grub ste /
analyzed: ji ste na gal te de dag dang tha mi dad pa mi 'grub ste /
translated: But if it is not established that it is not different from them,

original: de lta na rnam par shes pa du ma nyid du mi 'gyur ro zhe na /üîΩde'i phyir / tha dad na ni /
analyzed: de lta na rnam par shes pa du ma nyid du mi 'gyur ro zhe na / de'i phyir / tha dad na ni /
translated: then consciousness would not be multiple.

original: zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, ‚ÄúIf they are different,üîΩthen consciousness would be without a cause.‚Äù

original: tha dad par khas len na ni rgyu med pa can du 'gyur te /
analyzed: tha dad par khas len na ni rgyu med pa can du 'gyur te /
translated: If one accepts that they are different, then consciousness would be without a cause.

original: rnam par shes pa de zhes bya ba lhag ma'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa de zhes bya ba lhag ma'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúthat consciousness‚Äù is a remainder.

original: ci'i phyir rgyu med pa can du 'gyur snyam pa la /
analyzed: ci'i phyir rgyu med pa can du 'gyur snyam pa la /
translated: Why would it be without a cause?

original: rgyu'i byed pa rnam par shes pa las gzhan du 'bras bu'i bye brag la nye bar sbyar ba byas pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: rgyu'i byed pa rnam par shes pa las gzhan du 'bras bu'i bye brag la nye bar sbyar ba byas pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: because the activity of the cause is applied to the particular effect, which is different from consciousness.

original: de lta na yang rtag tu yod pa'am med pa zhig tu 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i nyes pa yod do //
analyzed: de lta na yang rtag tu yod pa'am med pa zhig tu 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i nyes pa yod do //
translated: But even so, the error would remain that it would always exist or not exist.

original: ji ste ji skad smos pa'i nyes pas 'jigs pa'i phyir tha dad par khas mi len na /
analyzed: ji ste ji skad smos pa'i nyes pas 'jigs pa'i phyir tha dad par khas mi len na /
translated: If, out of fear of the previously mentioned errors, one does not accept that they are different,

original: de ltar gyur na ni rnam par shes pa du ma nyid du 'gyur ba'i nyes pa sngar smos pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi gzhan yang yod de /
analyzed: de ltar gyur na ni rnam par shes pa du ma nyid du 'gyur ba'i nyes pa sngar smos pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi gzhan yang yod de /
translated: then not only would the previously mentioned error remain that there would be many consciousnesses, but another would also occur.

original: rtogs pa'i bdag nyid can la sogs pa de dag phan tshun tha @30b dad pa med par yang 'gyur te /
analyzed: rtogs pa'i bdag nyid can la sogs pa de dag phan tshun tha @30b dad pa med par yang 'gyur te /
translated: Those that have the nature of cognition, etc., would not be different from each other.

original: tha dad pa med par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: tha dad pa med par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: They would not be different, that is, they would be nondifferent.

original: ci'i phyir snyam pa la /
analyzed: ci'i phyir snyam pa la /
translated: Why?

original: rnam par shes pa gcig las gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa gcig las gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Because they are not different from a single consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa'i rang gi bdag nyid bzhin no //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i rang gi bdag nyid bzhin no //
translated: like the nature of consciousness itself.

original: de lta na ni rgyu'i yul tha dad par brtags pas don ci zhig gsos par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de lta na ni rgyu'i yul tha dad par brtags pas don ci zhig gsos par 'gyur te /
translated: If that is so, what purpose is served by postulating a difference in the object of the cause?

original: tshig bar ma ma smos pas rgyu'i byed pa'i yul tha dad par brtags pas zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: tshig bar ma ma smos pas rgyu'i byed pa'i yul tha dad par brtags pas zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Since the middle term is not mentioned, the meaning is: by postulating a difference in the object of the cause‚Äôs activity.

original: de'i phyir de lta bas na gnas skabs de'i nyes par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i phyir de lta bas na gnas skabs de'i nyes par 'gyur te /
translated: Therefore, in that case, there is the fault of that state,

original: ngo bo nyid tha dad pa mig la sogs pa dag las 'bras bu tha dad pa ma yin pa 'byung ba la /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid tha dad pa mig la sogs pa dag las 'bras bu tha dad pa ma yin pa 'byung ba la /
translated: because the effect arises from the different eyes, etc., without a difference in intrinsic nature.

original: rgyu tha dad pa ni tha dad pa byed par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: rgyu tha dad pa ni tha dad pa byed par mi 'gyur te /
translated: A difference in the cause does not produce a difference,

original: de tha dad kyang tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de tha dad kyang tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because even though there is a difference, there is no difference.

original: tha dad pa ma yin pa med kyang tha dad pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tha dad pa ma yin pa med kyang tha dad pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: Even without a difference, there would be no difference.

original: tha dad pa med pa yang tha dad pa med par byed par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tha dad pa med pa yang tha dad pa med par byed par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: A non-difference also does not produce a non-difference.

original: de'i phyir tha dad pa dang tha dad pa med pa ni rgyu med pa can du 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i phyir tha dad pa dang tha dad pa med pa ni rgyu med pa can du 'gyur te /
translated: Therefore, difference and non-difference would be without a cause.

original: thams cad kyang de las gud na med pa'i phyir ;
analyzed: thams cad kyang de las gud na med pa'i phyir ;
translated: because all of them are not separate from that.

original: thams cad kun rgyu med pa can du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thams cad kun rgyu med pa can du 'gyur ro //
translated: and all would be without a cause.

original: de ltar gyur na brtag tu yod pa'am med pa zhig tu 'gyur ro zhes smos pa gang yin pa snga na yod pa de'i gnas skabs zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar gyur na brtag tu yod pa'am med pa zhig tu 'gyur ro zhes smos pa gang yin pa snga na yod pa de'i gnas skabs zhes bya'o //
translated: If that were so, then it would be as was said before, ‚Äúit would be either existent or nonexistent.‚Äù

original: brgya zhig la shes pa de ni tha dad pa med pa kho na yin na /
analyzed: brgya zhig la shes pa de ni tha dad pa med pa kho na yin na /
translated: If that cognition is not different at all,

original: 'bras bu rtogs pa'i bdag nyid la sogs pa'i chos ni tha dad de rtog pas sgro btags pa yin no //
analyzed: 'bras bu rtogs pa'i bdag nyid la sogs pa'i chos ni tha dad de rtog pas sgro btags pa yin no //
translated: then the properties of the nature of the realization of the effect and so on are different, and they are imputed by thought.

original: de'i phyir de dag dang tha dad pa ma yin pa'i phyir shes pa du ma nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs dang / de dag kyang tha dad pa ma yin par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ma grub bo zhes smra bar dogs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i phyir de dag dang tha dad pa ma yin pa'i phyir shes pa du ma nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs dang / de dag kyang tha dad pa ma yin par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ma grub bo zhes smra bar dogs pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, because they are not different from that, the argument that ‚Äúthere would be many cognitions‚Äù and ‚Äúthey would not be different‚Äù is unestablished.

original: gal te de'i byed pa'i yul tha dad par brtags pa byed do zhe na ni zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: gal te de'i byed pa'i yul tha dad par brtags pa byed do zhe na ni zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: If you say that the object of its activity is imagined to be different, then it is as stated.

original: de'i zhes bya ba'i sgra ni rgyu dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: de'i zhes bya ba'i sgra ni rgyu dang sbyar ro //
translated: The word ‚Äúits‚Äù is to be connected with ‚Äúcause.‚Äù

original: ci zhig byas nas she na /
analyzed: ci zhig byas nas she na /
translated: What is done?

original: chos tha dad par brtag pa byas nas zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: chos tha dad par brtag pa byas nas zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: It is said, ‚Äúhaving analyzed the distinct features.‚Äù

original: su'i zhe na /
analyzed: su'i zhe na /
translated: Whose?

original: 'bras bu'i bdag nyid kyi'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i bdag nyid kyi'o //
translated: Of the effect.

original: ci 'dra ba zhe na /
analyzed: ci 'dra ba zhe na /
translated: What kind?

original: du ma las log pa dang ldan pa ste /
analyzed: du ma las log pa dang ldan pa ste /
translated: It is said, ‚Äúthe opposite of manifold.‚Äù

original: mi rtogs pa'i bdag nyid la sogs pa du ma las log pa'o //
analyzed: mi rtogs pa'i bdag nyid la sogs pa du ma las log pa'o //
translated: The opposite of manifold is the opposite of the nature of conceptualization, etc.

original: yang na log pa du ma zhes bye brag gi tshig sdud pa'o //
analyzed: yang na log pa du ma zhes bye brag gi tshig sdud pa'o //
translated: Or, the word ‚Äúmanifold‚Äù is a compound word.

original: chos tha dad pa brtag pa ji ltar byed snyam pa la /
analyzed: chos tha dad pa brtag pa ji ltar byed snyam pa la /
translated: How is the analysis of the distinct features done?

original: rgyu dang mthun par zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: rgyu dang mthun par zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: It is said, ‚Äúin accordance with the cause.‚Äù

original: rtogs pa'i bdag nyid yid la byed pa las /
analyzed: rtogs pa'i bdag nyid yid la byed pa las /
translated: From the mental attention to the nature of conceptualization,

original: rtogs pa'i ngo bo kho na zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang ngo //
analyzed: rtogs pa'i ngo bo kho na zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang ngo //
translated: the nature of conceptualization itself, etc.

original: gyis shig ces bya ba @31a * //
analyzed: gyis shig ces bya ba @31a * //
translated: is to be analyzed.

original: 'dis ni rjes su dga' ba ston to //
analyzed: 'dis ni rjes su dga' ba ston to //
translated: This shows the delight in the result.üîΩIf this position is thought to be faultless,

original: gal te phyogs 'di ji ga nyes pa med par 'gyur ro snyam pa la /
analyzed: gal te phyogs 'di ji ga nyes pa med par 'gyur ro snyam pa la /
translated: then it is said,

original: rgyu'i byed pa de ni yang dag pa'i don du na brtags pa pa kho na yin par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: rgyu'i byed pa de ni yang dag pa'i don du na brtags pa pa kho na yin par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: That causal activity is in reality only imagined.

original: ci'i phyir snyam pa la /
analyzed: ci'i phyir snyam pa la /
translated: Why is that?

original: rtog pa'i bzos sbyar ba dag la yin te zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: rtog pa'i bzos sbyar ba dag la yin te zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: It is in regard to what is fabricated by conceptualization.

original: rtogs pa'i bdag nyid la sogs pa dag la zhes bya ba lhag ma'o //
analyzed: rtogs pa'i bdag nyid la sogs pa dag la zhes bya ba lhag ma'o //
translated: The rest is: in regard to what has the nature of conceptualization, etc.

original: rgyu'i byed pa de ni rtog pa'i bzos sbyar ba dag la yin te /
analyzed: rgyu'i byed pa de ni rtog pa'i bzos sbyar ba dag la yin te /
translated: That causal activity is in regard to what is fabricated by conceptualization.

original: de'i phyir de lta bas na /
analyzed: de'i phyir de lta bas na /
translated: Therefore, thus.

original: yang dag pa'i don du na /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i don du na /
translated: In reality,

original: brtags pa pa kho na yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: brtags pa pa kho na yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: it is only imagined.

original: gal te brtags pa yin du zin kyang nyes pa ci zhig yod snyam pa la /
analyzed: gal te brtags pa yin du zin kyang nyes pa ci zhig yod snyam pa la /
translated: If it is imagined, what is the fault?

original: de lta na ni 'bras bu rgyu med pa can du 'gyur te zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: de lta na ni 'bras bu rgyu med pa can du 'gyur te zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: In that case, the effect would be without a cause, he says.

original: ci'i phyir 'bras bu rgyu med pa can du 'gyur snyam pa la /
analyzed: ci'i phyir 'bras bu rgyu med pa can du 'gyur snyam pa la /
translated: Why would the effect be without a cause?

original: rgyu'i byed pa brtags pa'i bdag nyid rnams la nye bar sbyor ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: rgyu'i byed pa brtags pa'i bdag nyid rnams la nye bar sbyor ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: Because the causal activity that has the nature of conceptualization is applied.

original: dngos su na 'bras bu tha dad pa ma yin yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang smras pa de la nyes pa brjod pa'i phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: dngos su na 'bras bu tha dad pa ma yin yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang smras pa de la nyes pa brjod pa'i phyir bshad pa /
translated: In response to the statement, ‚ÄúIn reality, the effect is not different,‚Äù and so on, to explain the error in that statement, Candrakƒ´rti says:

original: gzhan yang dngos su na 'bras bu tha dad pa ma yin yang gal te khyod bye brag rnams ni tha dad par khas len na /
analyzed: gzhan yang dngos su na 'bras bu tha dad pa ma yin yang gal te khyod bye brag rnams ni tha dad par khas len na /
translated: Moreover, if you accept that the particulars are different, even though in reality the effect is not different,

original: de ltar gyur na yang chos dang chos can dngos su tha dad pa kho nar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ltar gyur na yang chos dang chos can dngos su tha dad pa kho nar 'gyur te /
translated: then in that case the property and the basis of the property would be different in reality.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: tha dad pa dang tha dad pa ma yin pa'i ngo bo nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: tha dad pa dang tha dad pa ma yin pa'i ngo bo nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir /
translated: Because they would possess the nature of being different and not being different.

original: zla ba dang skar ma la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: zla ba dang skar ma la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: They would be like the moon and the stars.

original: de lta na shugs kyis spyi tha dad pa kho nar 'gyur ba 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
analyzed: de lta na shugs kyis spyi tha dad pa kho nar 'gyur ba 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
translated: In that case, not only would the universal be different in reality,

original: gzhan yang sngar smos pa'i nyes pa rgyu'i byed pa gzhan du sbyor ba byas pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gzhan yang sngar smos pa'i nyes pa rgyu'i byed pa gzhan du sbyor ba byas pa'i phyir /
translated: but also the previously mentioned error would occur, because the function of the cause would be applied elsewhere.

original: 'bras bu rgyu med pa can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba yang yod do //
analyzed: 'bras bu rgyu med pa can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba yang yod do //
translated: The effect would be causeless.

original: 'di ltar bye brag 'di dag kyang kun brtags pa kho na yin pas /
analyzed: 'di ltar bye brag 'di dag kyang kun brtags pa kho na yin pas /
translated: Thus, since these distinctions are only imagined,

original: dngos po tha dad pa dang tha dad pa ma yin pa'i ngo bo nyid dang ldan pa nyid du ma grub ste /
analyzed: dngos po tha dad pa dang tha dad pa ma yin pa'i ngo bo nyid dang ldan pa nyid du ma grub ste /
translated: they do not have the nature of being either different or non-different from things.

original: de lta yin pas ji skad smos pa'i nyes pa med do snyam du sems par gyur na /
analyzed: de lta yin pas ji skad smos pa'i nyes pa med do snyam du sems par gyur na /
translated: If you think that since this is the case, the previously mentioned faults do not exist,

original: ji ste bye brag de dag kyang brtags pa kho na yin no zhe na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: ji ste bye brag de dag kyang brtags pa kho na yin no zhe na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: then the root text asks, ‚ÄúBut if these distinctions are only imagined?‚Äù

original: de lta yin na ni zhes bya ba ni brtags pa nyid yin na'o //
analyzed: de lta yin na ni zhes bya ba ni brtags pa nyid yin na'o //
translated: ‚Äú In that case‚Äù means ‚Äúif they are only imagined.‚Äù

original: ci'i phyir rigs pa ma yin snyam pa la /
analyzed: ci'i phyir rigs pa ma yin snyam pa la /
translated: Why is it not reasonable?

original: rtog pas bkod pa'i tha dad pa ni rgyu'i byed pa la mi ltos so zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: rtog pas bkod pa'i tha dad pa ni rgyu'i byed pa la mi ltos so zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The root text states, ‚ÄúDistinctions that are created by thought do not depend on the activity of a cause.‚Äù

original: 'dir gtan tshigs ni rtog pas bkod pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'dir gtan tshigs ni rtog pas bkod pa nyid do //
translated: Here, the reason is ‚Äúcreated by thought.‚Äù

original: rgyu'i byed pa la mi ltos pa zhes bya @31b ba ni dam bca' ba'o //
analyzed: rgyu'i byed pa la mi ltos pa zhes bya @31b ba ni dam bca' ba'o //
translated: ‚Äú Do not depend on the activity of a cause‚Äù is the thesis.

original: nam mkha'i autpala la sogs pa ni dpe nyid du khong nas drang bar bya'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i autpala la sogs pa ni dpe nyid du khong nas drang bar bya'o //
translated: ‚Äú Like a sky-lotus‚Äù should be understood as an example.

original: 'bras bu tha dad ma yin yang //
analyzed: 'bras bu tha dad ma yin yang //
translated: The effect is not different,

original: bye brag rnams ni tha dad dang // gzhan min khyed 'dod de bas na //
analyzed: bye brag rnams ni tha dad dang // gzhan min khyed 'dod de bas na //
translated: but the particulars are different, and they are not different from it, according to you.

original: zhes bya bas ni 'bras bu tha dad pa ma yin zhing /
analyzed: zhes bya bas ni 'bras bu tha dad pa ma yin zhing /
translated: This shows that the effect is not different,

original: bye brag rnams ni tha dad pa yin la//
analyzed: bye brag rnams ni tha dad pa yin la//
translated: but the particulars are different.

original: 'bras bu las bye brag rnams gzhan pa yang ma yin na /
analyzed: 'bras bu las bye brag rnams gzhan pa yang ma yin na /
translated: And the particulars are not different from the effect.

original: de lta na yang snga ma dang phyi ma nang 'gal ba 'di ji ltar bzod ces bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta na yang snga ma dang phyi ma nang 'gal ba 'di ji ltar bzod ces bstan pa yin no //
translated: But how can you accept this contradiction of your former and later statements?

original: dbang phyug gis byas pa nyid kyis ni dbang phyug gis byas pa bzhin du tshig 'di rigs pa dang ldan pa ma yin no zhes 'phyas bya bar ston to //
analyzed: dbang phyug gis byas pa nyid kyis ni dbang phyug gis byas pa bzhin du tshig 'di rigs pa dang ldan pa ma yin no zhes 'phyas bya bar ston to //
translated: The statement that the effect is not different from the cause is not reasonable, just like the statement that the effect is created by God.

original: rtogs pa'i ngo bo las gzhan min par khas len na ni 'bras bu de ni gzugs las skye ba ma yin te /
analyzed: rtogs pa'i ngo bo las gzhan min par khas len na ni 'bras bu de ni gzugs las skye ba ma yin te /
translated: If you accept that the effect is not different from the nature of the cause, then that effect is not produced from form,

original: rtogs pa'i ngo bo las gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rtogs pa'i ngo bo las gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: because it is not different from the nature of the cause.

original: rtogs pa'i ngo bo'i rang gi bdag nyid bzhin no //
analyzed: rtogs pa'i ngo bo'i rang gi bdag nyid bzhin no //
translated: It is just like the nature of the cause itself.

original: de'i rnam pa de las te /
analyzed: de'i rnam pa de las te /
translated: From that aspect of it.

original: yul gyi rnam pa las gzhan min phyir 'bras bu de gzugs las kyang ni skye bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: yul gyi rnam pa las gzhan min phyir 'bras bu de gzugs las kyang ni skye bar 'gyur te /
translated: because it is not different from the aspect of the object, the effect would also arise from form.

original: yul gyi rnam pa las gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: yul gyi rnam pa las gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: because it is not different from the aspect of the object,

original: yul gyi rnam pa'i rang gi bdag nyid bzhin no //
analyzed: yul gyi rnam pa'i rang gi bdag nyid bzhin no //
translated: like the intrinsic nature of the aspect of the object.

original: de lta na ni 'bras bu gcig la skye ba dang / mi skye ba dag tu thal bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de lta na ni 'bras bu gcig la skye ba dang / mi skye ba dag tu thal bar 'gyur la /
translated: In that case, it follows that a single effect would both arise and not arise,

original: rgyu gcig la skyed par byed pa dang / skyed par byed pa ma yin pa dag tu thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: rgyu gcig la skyed par byed pa dang / skyed par byed pa ma yin pa dag tu thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: and a single cause would both produce and not produce.

original: skye ba dang mi skye bde dag kyang ci'i phyir na mi 'gal zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: skye ba dang mi skye bde dag kyang ci'i phyir na mi 'gal zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: Why would the arising and non-arising of a single effect not be contradictory?

original: 'bras bu du ma la mi 'gal ba kho na'o snyam na 'bras bu gcig la zhes bya ba smos so //üîΩgal te 'bras bu gcig pu de la yang rim gyis 'gal ba med do snyam na yang /
analyzed: 'bras bu du ma la mi 'gal ba kho na'o snyam na 'bras bu gcig la zhes bya ba smos so // gal te 'bras bu gcig pu de la yang rim gyis 'gal ba med do snyam na yang /
translated: If you think that it is not contradictory for a single effect to arise and not arise, then it is said: ‚Äúwith respect to a single effect.‚Äù

original: cig car zhes bya ba smos so //üîΩbrtags pas na 'gal ba med do snyam na /
analyzed: cig car zhes bya ba smos so // brtags pas na 'gal ba med do snyam na /
translated: If you think that it is not contradictory for a single effect to arise and not arise sequentially, then it is said: ‚Äúsimultaneously.‚Äù

original: yang dag par zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: yang dag par zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: If you think that it is not contradictory because it is imagined, then it is said: ‚Äúin reality.‚Äù

original: de bzhin du rgyu gcig la skyed byed dang skyed byed ma yin pa ci'i phyir mi 'gal zhes bya bar sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du rgyu gcig la skyed byed dang skyed byed ma yin pa ci'i phyir mi 'gal zhes bya bar sbyar te /
translated: So too, why is it not contradictory for a single cause to be both a producer and a nonproducer?

original: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The rest is as before.
