original: tshad mas grub pa ni su la'ang ma grub bo zhes brjod par rigs pa ma yin no snyam du bsams pa'o //
analyzed: tshad mas grub pa ni su la'ang ma grub bo zhes brjod par rigs pa ma yin no snyam du bsams pa'o //
translated: It is not reasonable to say that something established by a valid cognition is not established for anyone.

original: de lta na yang 'di khyod kho na la nyes pa yin gyi /
analyzed: de lta na yang 'di khyod kho na la nyes pa yin gyi /
translated: Even so, this fault is only for you,

original: khyab pa ma grub pa'i phyir nga la ni ma yin no snyam nas //üîΩmkhas khyod ci phyir bdag nyid kyi //
analyzed: khyab pa ma grub pa'i phyir nga la ni ma yin no snyam nas // mkhas khyod ci phyir bdag nyid kyi //
translated: but not for me, because the pervasion is not established.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: Thinking this, he says, ‚ÄúYou, the learned one, why do you, etc.?‚Äù

original: gal te gtan tshigs tshad mas ma grub bo snyam du sems na de ni bzang po ma yin te /
analyzed: gal te gtan tshigs tshad mas ma grub bo snyam du sems na de ni bzang po ma yin te /
translated: If you think that the reason is not established by a valid cognition, that is not good,

original: 'di ltar yang dang yang du bsgrubs zin to //
analyzed: 'di ltar yang dang yang du bsgrubs zin to //
translated: because it has been proven again and again.

original: de res 'ga' ma yin zhes bya ba lhag ma'o //
analyzed: de res 'ga' ma yin zhes bya ba lhag ma'o //
translated: It is not occasional.

original: ji ltar snyam pa la bshad pa /
analyzed: ji ltar snyam pa la bshad pa /
translated: How is that?

original: yod med skye ba bkag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yod med skye ba bkag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is because the arising of the existent and the non-existent are refuted.

original: skyes zin pa yang mi skye bas yod pa skye ba dgag pa ni rung na /
analyzed: skyes zin pa yang mi skye bas yod pa skye ba dgag pa ni rung na /
translated: Since that which has arisen does not arise again, the refutation of the arising of the existent is tenable.

original: med pa skye ba @43b go ji ltar dgag pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: med pa skye ba @43b go ji ltar dgag pa ma yin nam /
translated: But how is the arising of the non-existent refuted?

original: de'i phyir 'di dpyad par bya ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di dpyad par bya ste /
translated: Therefore, this should be analyzed.

original: de la ci ri bong gi rva la sogs pa dang myu gu la sogs pa med pa la bye brag cung zad kyang yod dam nus par brjod pa thams cad dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid kyi lus 'dzin par bye brag ci yang med de /
analyzed: de la ci ri bong gi rva la sogs pa dang myu gu la sogs pa med pa la bye brag cung zad kyang yod dam nus par brjod pa thams cad dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid kyi lus 'dzin par bye brag ci yang med de /
translated: In this regard, is there any difference at all between the non-existence of the horn of a rabbit and so on and the non-existence of a sprout and so on?

original: dus sngar 'byung ba can du rnam par rtog na /
analyzed: dus sngar 'byung ba can du rnam par rtog na /
translated: If one imagines that the former exists earlier and the latter later,

original: med pa 'di'i rang gi ngo bo nyams par 'gyur te /
analyzed: med pa 'di'i rang gi ngo bo nyams par 'gyur te /
translated: the nature of this non-existence would be impaired.

original: s'a lu'i sa bon la 'di ltar bye brag gi ngo bo dang ldan pa'i lus 'dzin pa la ni gang gi phyir /
analyzed: s'a lu'i sa bon la 'di ltar bye brag gi ngo bo dang ldan pa'i lus 'dzin pa la ni gang gi phyir /
translated: Because the body of a rice seed that possesses a specific nature is

original: ri bong gi rva la sogs pa lta bur 'di med pa'i tha snyad kyi yul nyid du 'gyur ba nus par brjod pa thams cad dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid du brtag tu med do //
analyzed: ri bong gi rva la sogs pa lta bur 'di med pa'i tha snyad kyi yul nyid du 'gyur ba nus par brjod pa thams cad dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid du brtag tu med do //
translated: It is not nonexistent, like the horns of a rabbit, as an object of the convention ‚ÄúIt does not exist.‚Äù

original: ji ste pha rol po dus phyis 'byung ba can la brten te rnam par rtog na 'on kyang ji ste /
analyzed: ji ste pha rol po dus phyis 'byung ba can la brten te rnam par rtog na 'on kyang ji ste /
translated: If the opponent conceives of it as occurring at a later time, then it must be said:

original: s'a lu'i sa bon las s'a lu'i myu gu med pa kho na skye bar 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: s'a lu'i sa bon las s'a lu'i myu gu med pa kho na skye bar 'gyur gyi /
translated: ‚ÄúThe rice sprout arises only from the rice seed,

original: gzhan nam mkha'i autpala sogs pa dang nas kyi myu gu la sogs pa ni ci ste ma yin zhes bya ba brjod par bya dgos te /
analyzed: gzhan nam mkha'i autpala sogs pa dang nas kyi myu gu la sogs pa ni ci ste ma yin zhes bya ba brjod par bya dgos te /
translated: but not from something else, such as a lotus, or from a barley seed, and so on.‚Äù

original: med pa la ni bdag nyid kyi bye brag tha dad pa chung ngu yang ci yang brtag tu med de /
analyzed: med pa la ni bdag nyid kyi bye brag tha dad pa chung ngu yang ci yang brtag tu med de /
translated: For if something is nonexistent, it cannot be conceived to have even the slightest difference in its nature.

original: 'di ltar bdag nyid kyi bye brag srid na /
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag nyid kyi bye brag srid na /
translated: If it is possible to have a difference in its nature,

original: med pa'i med pa nyid rnam par rtog pa'i yul du 'gyur bar dka'o //
analyzed: med pa'i med pa nyid rnam par rtog pa'i yul du 'gyur bar dka'o //
translated: it is difficult to conceive of a nonexistent as the object of conception.

original: bdag nyid kyi bye brag med de /
analyzed: bdag nyid kyi bye brag med de /
translated: It is not possible to have a difference in its nature.

original: med pa nyid du mtshungs par spyod pa las 'ga' zhig las 'ga' zhig skye'o zhes bya ba'i tshig 'di'i mkhas pa'i sems 'phrog par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: med pa nyid du mtshungs par spyod pa las 'ga' zhig las 'ga' zhig skye'o zhes bya ba'i tshig 'di'i mkhas pa'i sems 'phrog par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: The word ‚Äúsome‚Äù does not captivate the mind of the wise.

original: s'a lu'i sa bon ni s'a lu'i myu gu med pa kho na skye ba sgrub nus pa'i bye brag dang ldan gyi gzhan ni ma yin pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: s'a lu'i sa bon ni s'a lu'i myu gu med pa kho na skye ba sgrub nus pa'i bye brag dang ldan gyi gzhan ni ma yin pa ma yin nam /
translated: Isn‚Äôt it the case that a rice seed has the capacity to produce a rice sprout, but not another kind of seed?

original: de'i phyir ji ltar thams cad bdag gir ma byas pa'i bye brag dang ldan pa med pa skyed par byed /
analyzed: de'i phyir ji ltar thams cad bdag gir ma byas pa'i bye brag dang ldan pa med pa skyed par byed /
translated: Therefore, how could it be that all things that are not endowed with the capacity to produce what is not already existent produce what is not already existent?

original: 'di lta bu mngon par rjod pa'i rgol ba la ni ltag rmen bsal na mig gi 'bras bu 'byung ba lta bu'i nyes par 'gyur te /üîΩ'di ltar khyod s'a lu'i sa bon ni med pa 'ga' skye ba'i mthu'i bye brag dang ldan pa la rten gyi /
analyzed: 'di lta bu mngon par rjod pa'i rgol ba la ni ltag rmen bsal na mig gi 'bras bu 'byung ba lta bu'i nyes par 'gyur te / 'di ltar khyod s'a lu'i sa bon ni med pa 'ga' skye ba'i mthu'i bye brag dang ldan pa la rten gyi /
translated: In response to this objection, the opponent would be like someone who, when his eyes are scratched, says, ‚ÄúMy eyes are clear.‚ÄùüîΩThe opponent says, ‚ÄúThe rice seed has the capacity to produce a rice sprout, but not all nonexistent things.‚Äù

original: med pa ma lus pa ni ma yin no zhes smra na /üîΩbde ba la sogs pa bzhin du yod pa'i bye brag dang ldan pas /
analyzed: med pa ma lus pa ni ma yin no zhes smra na /üîΩbde ba la sogs pa bzhin du yod pa'i bye brag dang ldan pas /
translated: But the rice seed has the capacity to produce a rice sprout, but not another kind of seed.

original: med pa'i ngo bo 'dor bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: med pa'i ngo bo 'dor bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The nature of nonexistence would be abandoned.

original: de lta na yang bde blag tu phyogs snga ma nyams pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro //üîΩji ste yod pa skye bar 'gyur ram /
analyzed: de lta na yang bde blag tu phyogs snga ma nyams pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro // ji ste yod pa skye bar 'gyur ram /
translated: Even so, the fault of the opponent‚Äôs position would be easily undermined.üîΩIf you ask, ‚ÄúDoes an existent arise or does a nonexistent arise?‚Äù

original: med pa skye bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bsam pa 'dis kho bo cag la ci zhig bya /
analyzed: med pa skye bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bsam pa 'dis kho bo cag la ci zhig bya /
translated: What does this thought of yours do to us?

original: rgyu las 'bras bu skye bar snang ste /
analyzed: rgyu las 'bras bu skye bar snang ste /
translated: An effect appears to arise from a cause.

original: kho bo cag ni 'di tsam gyis yongs su mgu'o snyam na /
analyzed: kho bo cag ni 'di tsam gyis yongs su mgu'o snyam na /
translated: We are satisfied with just that much.

original: bden @44a * //
analyzed: bden @44a * //
translated: You say, ‚ÄúThat is true.

original: te khyod de skad du smra ba na yongs su mgu ba skyes mod kyi /
analyzed: te khyod de skad du smra ba na yongs su mgu ba skyes mod kyi /
translated: When you speak in that way, we are satisfied.

original: rgyu las don dam pa kho nar 'bras bu skye'o zhes smra ba na /
analyzed: rgyu las don dam pa kho nar 'bras bu skye'o zhes smra ba na /
translated: But when you say that an effect arises from a cause ultimately,

original: rnam par rtog pa gnyis las byung ba dngos por gnas pa'i nyes pa bshad ma thag pa gnyis spang bar mi nus te /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa gnyis las byung ba dngos por gnas pa'i nyes pa bshad ma thag pa gnyis spang bar mi nus te /
translated: you cannot avoid the two faults that arise from the two conceptions and that have just been explained.

original: de'i phyir bsod nams dang mi ldan pa la yongs su mgu ba ltag las 'byung /
analyzed: de'i phyir bsod nams dang mi ldan pa la yongs su mgu ba ltag las 'byung /
translated: Therefore, satisfaction arises from the opposite of merit.

original: de bas na zhar la 'ongs pas chog go //üîΩgang gi phyir /
analyzed: de bas na zhar la 'ongs pas chog go //üîΩgang gi phyir /
translated: Therefore, let us stop this digression.

original: khyab ba de yang khyod kyis smras pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: khyab ba de yang khyod kyis smras pa de'i phyir /
translated: And that pervasion is because of what you have said.

original: de lta yin na khyod kyis nyes pa zhes bya bar sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: de lta yin na khyod kyis nyes pa zhes bya bar sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: If that is so, then you should apply the term ‚Äúfault‚Äù to yourself.

original: ci'i phyir khyod la nyes pa med snyam pa la /
analyzed: ci'i phyir khyod la nyes pa med snyam pa la /
translated: Why do you think you are without fault?

original: kho bo'i bden par zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te //
analyzed: kho bo'i bden par zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te //
translated: In response to that, he says, ‚ÄúMy truth . . . ‚Äù and so on.

original: khyab par bya ba dang khyab par byed pa'i dngos po ma grub pa ni de'i bdag nyid dang de las byung ba'i mtshan nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa'i phyir ro snyam du bsams pa'o //
analyzed: khyab par bya ba dang khyab par byed pa'i dngos po ma grub pa ni de'i bdag nyid dang de las byung ba'i mtshan nyid kyi 'brel ba med pa'i phyir ro snyam du bsams pa'o //
translated: The nonestablishment of the entity of the pervaded and the pervader is because there is no relation characterized by identity and origination from that.

original: de nyid ji ltar ma yin snyam pa la /üîΩyang dag skye ba bkag pa yis //
analyzed: de nyid ji ltar ma yin snyam pa la / yang dag skye ba bkag pa yis //
translated: How is that not so?

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te //
translated: In response to that, he says, ‚ÄúBy refuting real arising . . . ‚Äù and so on.

original: dgag par bya ba dang 'gog par byed pa'i bye brag gis /
analyzed: dgag par bya ba dang 'gog par byed pa'i bye brag gis /
translated: The difference between the object of negation and the negating agent is

original: dgag pa de gnyis tha dad do snyam du bsams pa'o //
analyzed: dgag pa de gnyis tha dad do snyam du bsams pa'o //
translated: the difference between the two negations.

original: brgya zhig la mi skye ba de gnyis yang dag par na bye brag 'ga' zhig yod pa ma yin nam zhes smra bar 'gyur bas /
analyzed: brgya zhig la mi skye ba de gnyis yang dag par na bye brag 'ga' zhig yod pa ma yin nam zhes smra bar 'gyur bas /
translated: If it is asked, ‚ÄúIn that case, are not those two nonarisings different in some way in reality?‚Äù

original: bshad pa / yang dag par na gnyis po yang dag par skye ba med pa dang / kun rdzob tu mi skye bdag med do //
analyzed: bshad pa / yang dag par na gnyis po yang dag par skye ba med pa dang / kun rdzob tu mi skye bdag med do //
translated: NƒÅgƒÅrjuna responds: In reality, both are not produced, And in the conventional, they are not produced and do not exist.

original: ji lta snyam pa la /üîΩgang phyir spros dang bral ba ni //
analyzed: ji lta snyam pa la / gang phyir spros dang bral ba ni //
translated: How is that?

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: He says, ‚ÄúBecause it is free from fabrication,‚Äù and so on.

original: de'i phyir spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i de kho na /
analyzed: de'i phyir spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i de kho na /
translated: Therefore, thatness, which is free from all fabrication,

original: de la gtan tshigs la sogs pa yan lag med do //
analyzed: de la gtan tshigs la sogs pa yan lag med do //
translated: does not have parts, such as reasons.

original: sogs pa smos pas ni /
analyzed: sogs pa smos pas ni /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúand so on‚Äù

original: dpe dang phyogs yongs su bsdu'o //
analyzed: dpe dang phyogs yongs su bsdu'o //
translated: includes examples and the inclusion of the subject.

original: de lta na yang khyod kyis 'dod pa'i don nyid mi 'grub po snyam du bsams pa'o //
analyzed: de lta na yang khyod kyis 'dod pa'i don nyid mi 'grub po snyam du bsams pa'o //
translated: Even so, you think that the point you want to prove is not established.

original: gal te 'o na de las byung ba'i mtshan nyid kyi 'brel par 'gyur ro snyam na /
analyzed: gal te 'o na de las byung ba'i mtshan nyid kyi 'brel par 'gyur ro snyam na /
translated: If you think that the connection is the characteristic of arising from that,

original: 'di ltar de gnyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: 'di ltar de gnyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: he says, ‚ÄúIn that case, those two,‚Äù and so on.

original: gal te dngos po'i stobs kyis zhugs pa'i sgrub pa mi rung na /
analyzed: gal te dngos po'i stobs kyis zhugs pa'i sgrub pa mi rung na /
translated: If it is not possible for a proof to engage through the power of things,

original: 'o na thal bar 'gyur ro snyam pa la /
analyzed: 'o na thal bar 'gyur ro snyam pa la /
translated: then you think that it follows that

original: 'di nyid kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so /
analyzed: 'di nyid kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so /
translated: He says by this very reason, etc.,

original: gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gtan tshigs kyi snon bstan to //
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gtan tshigs kyi snon bstan to //
translated: and Moreover, etc., he teaches the addition of a reason.

original: ci'i phyir tshad mas mi rung snyam pa la /
analyzed: ci'i phyir tshad mas mi rung snyam pa la /
translated: Why is it not suitable by a valid cognition?

original: tshad ma ma yin pa la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: tshad ma ma yin pa la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: He says in regard to what is not a valid cognition, etc.,

original: ci'i phyir gnod pa med snyam pa la /
analyzed: ci'i phyir gnod pa med snyam pa la /
translated: Why is it not unobstructed?

original: rigs pas 'ongs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: rigs pas 'ongs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: He says what is reasonable, etc.,

original: @44b blun po ni sdang bar rigs pa kho na yin pas /
analyzed: @44b blun po ni sdang bar rigs pa kho na yin pas /
translated: Since a fool is just one who is hostile to reasoning,

original: rtog pa sngon du gtong ba smos so //
analyzed: rtog pa sngon du gtong ba smos so //
translated: he says preceded by a conceptual thought.,

original: dpyad pa ni khas blangs pa'i ched yin na /
analyzed: dpyad pa ni khas blangs pa'i ched yin na /
translated: If analysis is for the sake of accepting something,

original: gal te ci zhig ltar na kun rdzob khas blangs par gyur pa de'i tshe dpyad pa mi mdzes so zhe na /
analyzed: gal te ci zhig ltar na kun rdzob khas blangs par gyur pa de'i tshe dpyad pa mi mdzes so zhe na /
translated: if one were to ask, Why is it not proper to analyze when one has accepted the conventional?

original: gang gi phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: He says because, etc.,

original: dpyod par yang byed pas de'i phyir 'di sngar khas ma blangs so snyam du bsams pa'o //
analyzed: dpyod par yang byed pas de'i phyir 'di sngar khas ma blangs so snyam du bsams pa'o //
translated: thinking that one should not accept it previously because one also analyzes it.

original: 'di nyid ci'i phyir snyam pa la /
analyzed: 'di nyid ci'i phyir snyam pa la /
translated: Why is this very thing?

original: 'di ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: Thus, etc.

original: 'di smra nyid la'am zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'di smra nyid la'am zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is said to the opponent,

original: dbu ma pa la ste /
analyzed: dbu ma pa la ste /
translated: to the Madhyamika.

original: kun rdzob khas mi len na khyod la yang mngon sum la sogs pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro snyam du bsams pa'o //üîΩbrgya zhig la kho bo cag 'di yongs su spong ngo //
analyzed: kun rdzob khas mi len na khyod la yang mngon sum la sogs pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro snyam du bsams pa'o // brgya zhig la kho bo cag 'di yongs su spong ngo //
translated: If you do not accept the conventional, then you contradict perception, etc.

original: zhes pha rol po smra bar 'gyur bas gang gis na khyod ma gtogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //üîΩbrgya zhig la kho bo cag 'di yongs su mi spong mod kyi /üîΩ'dis bdag cag mi 'jigs so zhes smra bar 'gyur na /
analyzed: zhes pha rol po smra bar 'gyur bas gang gis na khyod ma gtogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so // brgya zhig la kho bo cag 'di yongs su mi spong mod kyi / 'dis bdag cag mi 'jigs so zhes smra bar 'gyur na /
translated: If the opponent were to say, ‚ÄúWe reject this,‚Äù then the reply would be, ‚ÄúBy whom, etc.‚Äù

original: gal te des khyed mi 'jigs so zhe na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //üîΩkun rdzob ni ji ltar snang ba bzhin zhes bya ba ni mngon sum zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: gal te des khyed mi 'jigs so zhe na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so // kun rdzob ni ji ltar snang ba bzhin zhes bya ba ni mngon sum zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: If the opponent were to say, ‚ÄúWe do not reject this, but it does not frighten us,‚Äù then the reply would be, ‚ÄúIf it does not frighten you, etc.‚ÄùüîΩThe conventional is just as it appears, which means that it is perception.

original: tshad mas zhes bya ba ni rjes su dpag pas so //
analyzed: tshad mas zhes bya ba ni rjes su dpag pas so //
translated: By a valid cognition means by inference.

original: de la zhes bya bas ni mngon sum gyi tshad ma la'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya bas ni mngon sum gyi tshad ma la'o //
translated: The phrase in that case refers to the case of direct perception.

original: gnod pa 'bab na zhes bya ba ni kun rdzob mngon sum yin pa'i phyir ro snyam du bsams pa'o //
analyzed: gnod pa 'bab na zhes bya ba ni kun rdzob mngon sum yin pa'i phyir ro snyam du bsams pa'o //
translated: The phrase it would be undermined means that it would be undermined by direct perception of the conventional.üîΩWhy is it that the opponent considers the conventional to be unreliable? The phrase because it is unreliable indicates this.

original: ci'i phyir yid brtan du mi rung bar brjod snyam pa la /
analyzed: ci'i phyir yid brtan du mi rung bar brjod snyam pa la /
translated: The phrase because it is unreliable indicates this.

original: mtshan nyid dang ldan pa la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: mtshan nyid dang ldan pa la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: The phrase because it is unreliable indicates this.üîΩThe phrase because it is unreliable indicates this.üîΩThe phrase because it is unreliable indicates this.üîΩThe phrase because it is unreliable indicates this.üîΩThe phrase because it is unreliable indicates this.

original: de lta na yang tshad ma med pa'i phyir tshig tsam gyis ni kun rdzob kyang dgag par mi nus pa kho na'o snyam du sems pa'o //üîΩtshad ma med pa'i phyir ram tshad mas gnod pa'i phyir /üîΩgang zhig yang dag dngos mi 'dod pa'i smra ba de la tshad ma med pa'am /
analyzed: de lta na yang tshad ma med pa'i phyir tshig tsam gyis ni kun rdzob kyang dgag par mi nus pa kho na'o snyam du sems pa'o // tshad ma med pa'i phyir ram tshad mas gnod pa'i phyir / gang zhig yang dag dngos mi 'dod pa'i smra ba de la tshad ma med pa'am /
translated: The phrase because it is unreliable indicates this.üîΩThe phrase because it is unreliable indicates this.üîΩThe phrase because it is unreliable indicates this.üîΩThe phrase because it is unreliable indicates this.

analyzed: tshad mas gnod pa'i kun rdzob ci zhig smos / 'dod pa zhes bya ba lhag ma ste /
translated: The phrase because it is unreliable indicates this.üîΩThe phrase because it is unreliable indicates this.üîΩThe phrase because it is unreliable indicates this.üîΩThe phrase because it is unreliable indicates this.üîΩThe phrase because it is unreliable indicates this.üîΩThe phrase because it is unreliable indicates this.üîΩThe phrase because it is unreliable indicates this.üîΩThe phrase because it is unreliable indicates this.üîΩThe phrase because it is unreliable indicates this.üîΩThe phrase because it is unreliable indicates this.üîΩThe phrase because it is unreliable indicates this.üîΩThe phrase because it is unreliable indicates this.üîΩThe phrase because it is unreliable indicates this.üîΩThe phrase because it is unreliable indicates this.üîΩThe phrase because it is unreliable indicates this.üîΩThe phrase because it is unreliable indicates this.üîΩThe phrase because it is unreliable indicates this.üîΩThe phrase because it is unreliable indicates this.üîΩThe phrase because it is unreliable indicates this.üîΩThe phrase because it is unreliable indicates this.üîΩThe phrase because it is unreliable indicates this.üîΩThe phrase because it is unreliable indicates this.üîΩThe phrase because it is unreliable indicates this.

original: de la de 'dod pa shin tu yang med do snyam du bsams pa'o //
analyzed: de la de 'dod pa shin tu yang med do snyam du bsams pa'o //
translated: The phrase because it is unreliable indicates this.üîΩThe phrase

original: gal te kun rdzob khas ma blangs na tha snyad med pa dang ; don byed pa med par 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te kun rdzob khas ma blangs na tha snyad med pa dang ; don byed pa med par 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
translated: If one does not accept the conventional, would not conventions and the performance of functions be nonexistent?

original: de'i phyir khyod kyis kun rdzob gdon mi za bar khas blangs par bya dgos so zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir khyod kyis kun rdzob gdon mi za bar khas blangs par bya dgos so zhe na /
translated: Therefore, you must accept the conventional without doubt.

original: bshad pa ci /
analyzed: bshad pa ci /
translated: We reply: What?

original: tha snyad la sogs pa med pa de smra bar gzhan la'ang mi mtshungs sam /
analyzed: tha snyad la sogs pa med pa de smra bar gzhan la'ang mi mtshungs sam /
translated: Is it not the same for others that conventions, etc., are nonexistent?

original: tha snyad la sogs pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir des kyang kun @45a * //
analyzed: tha snyad la sogs pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir des kyang kun @45a * //
translated: Because of the consequence that conventions, etc., are nonexistent, you must accept the conventional.

original: rdzob tu khas blang bar bya ba thos so zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rdzob tu khas blang bar bya ba thos so zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This is the meaning of the statement.

original: ci'i phyir snyam pa la /üîΩ'jig rten bzhin du bsnyad bya dgos //
analyzed: ci'i phyir snyam pa la / 'jig rten bzhin du bsnyad bya dgos //
translated: Why?
